attributes.action: get rid of the building planning lines of villages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Get rid of the blanket policy of building lines of villages. Let each planning application be considered on its own merits. Agriculture land is protected any way. So instead of just in filling every village main street. Let it expand naturally. Some villages have small pockets of land outside the building line that can be used.
